properties.title: Tickle path Brunni
properties.abstract: Here's a special wellness experience: a «Kitzelpfad» (translated literally = tickle path) which encircles Lake Härzlisee (1,860 m above sea level). This unique path has been designed for walking in your bare feet. It's located directly next to the chairlift.
properties.description:
What a sensational pleasure it is to walk barefoot along this path lined with changing textures: sand, wood chips, gravel, soft clay, pools of water. The different materials provide unique tactile stimulation for your feet: soft and smooth, prickly and tickly, rough, uneven, wet and dry. Give your tired feet a treat after a long hike. This is relaxation and revitalization at its best. As they say - happy feet, happy heart.

Brunni Alpine Herb Paths. Yet another highlight of the Brunni: two medicinal herb paths. The wisdoms and secrets of Alpine natural healing have been cultivated and handed down for generations. Along two different native plant paths - one around Lake Härzlisee, the other located just beyond the chairlift area — you can study the various healing herbs in their natural environment.
properties.name: Engelberg-Titlis Tourismus AG
